Alert.Name: SARAHS_ALERT
Alert.AlertMessage: Sheesh, this file is a mess!

Item.Name: ID
Item.Hint: ID number, press LIST key for name/ID search.

Trigger.Name: POST-CHANGE
Trigger.TriggerText:
/* Replace trigger with code from WHEN-VALIDATE-TRIGGER as part of
4.0 conversion */
S$_VALID_ID(:ID,:PIDM,:FULL_NAME,:CONFID_IND,:DCSD_IND);
G$_CHECK_FAILURE;

Trigger.Name: KEY-LISTVAL
Trigger.TriggerText:
G$_COPY_FLD_ATTR;
:GLOBAL.SECRFRM := 'SOAIDEN';
EXECUTE_TRIGGER('G$_REVOKE_ACCESS');
G$_CHECK_FAILURE;
G$_SECURED_FORM_CALL(:global.current_user,:global.secrfrm,'QUERY');
G$_RESET_GLOBAL;
--
 IF :GLOBAL.VALUE IS NOT NULL THEN
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'LIST_VALUES_COPY' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;
--
 G$_CHECK_VALUE ((:KEY_BLOCK.ID IS NULL),
 NULL, TRUE, TRUE);
--
 NEXT_FIELD ;

Trigger.Name: POST-CHANGE
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 PTI_INTO_TEMP VARCHAR2(255);
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM STVTERM
 WHERE STVTERM_CODE = :KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO PTI_INTO_TEMP ;
 IF PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND THEN
 GOTO CALL_INVALID_CODE_MSG ;
 ELSE
 RETURN ;
 END IF ;
 END ;
--
 << CALL_INVALID_CODE_MSG >>
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'INVALID_CODE_MSG' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;

Trigger.Name: KEY-CQUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'GET_TERM' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;

Item.Name: HOLD_TERM_CODE
Item.Hint: Term;Press LIST for valid codes,COUNT QUERY HITS for student terms.

Trigger.Name: POST-CHANGE
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 PTI_INTO_TEMP VARCHAR2(255);
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM STVTERM
 WHERE STVTERM_CODE = :KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO PTI_INTO_TEMP ;
 IF PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND THEN
 GOTO CALL_INVALID_CODE_MSG ;
 ELSE
 RETURN ;
 END IF ;
 END ;
--
 << CALL_INVALID_CODE_MSG >>
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'INVALID_CODE_MSG' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;

Trigger.Name: KEY-CQUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'GET_TERM' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;

Trigger.Name: KEY-CQUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
-- CALL_QUERY( 'SHQTERM' ) ;
EXECUTE_TRIGGER('G$_REVOKE_ACCESS');
G$_CHECK_FAILURE;
 G$_SECURED_FORM_CALL(:GLOBAL.CURRENT_USER,'SHQTERM','QUERY');

Trigger.Name: KEY-MENU
Trigger.TriggerText:
EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'INVALID_FUNCTION_MSG' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;

Trigger.Name: KEY-NXTBLK
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE IS NULL THEN
 GO_FIELD ('KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE');
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'ALLERR' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 ELSE
 IF :KEY_BLOCK.ID IS NULL THEN
 GO_FIELD('KEY_BLOCK.ID');
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'ALLERR' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;
 END IF ;

EXECUTE_TRIGGER ('TERM_CONTROL') ;
GO_BLOCK ('SGBSTDN');
 EXECUTE_QUERY;
GO_BLOCK ('RORSAPR');
 EXECUTE_QUERY;
GO_BLOCK ('RRRAREQ');
 EXECUTE_QUERY;
GO_BLOCK ('RZDFLOG');
 EXECUTE_QUERY;
EXECUTE_TRIGGER ('CHECK_SAP');
EXECUTE_TRIGGER ('CHECK_MAJOR');
EXECUTE_TRIGGER ('CHECK_PCKG_COMP');
EXECUTE_TRIGGER ('CHECK_ADJ_HRS');
EXECUTE_TRIGGER ('CHECK_CREDIT_HRS');
EXECUTE_TRIGGER ('CHECK_DEF_DROP_DATE');
EXECUTE_TRIGGER ('CHECK_TRACKING_REQ');
EXECUTE_TRIGGER ('CHECK_DEGREE_GRAD');
EXECUTE_TRIGGER ('CHECK_PELL_AMT');


--next_block;
GO_BLOCK ('TBRMEMO');
 EXECUTE_QUERY;

EXECUTE_TRIGGER ('CHECK_HOW_MANY');

Trigger.Name: ALLERR
Trigger.TriggerText:
MESSAGE( '*ERROR* Must enter all Key Information.' ) ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;

Trigger.Name: KEY-PRVBLK
Trigger.TriggerText:
execute_trigger('invalid_function_msg');
/* EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'CHECK_KEYS' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
--
 PREVIOUS_BLOCK ;
 PREVIOUS_BLOCK ;
 EXECUTE_QUERY ;*/

Trigger.Name: CHECK_KEYS
Trigger.TriggerText:
G$_CHECK_VALUE (NOT (:PIDM IS NOT NULL
 AND :ID IS NOT NULL),
 '*ERROR* A valid ID must be entered before proceeding.',
 TRUE, TRUE);

Block.Name: SGBSTDN
Block.WhereClause:
where sgbstdn_pidm = :key_block.pidm
 and sgbstdn_term_code_eff =
 (select max(sgbstdn_term_code_eff)
 from saturn.sgbstdn
 where sgbstdn_term_code_eff <= :key_block.keyblck_term_code
 and sgbstdn_pidm = :key_block.pidm
 and sgbstdn_levl_code = '00')
 and sgbstdn_levl_code = '00'

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN
 select stvmajr_desc,
 nvl(stvmajr_aid_eligibility_ind,'N')
 INTO :SGBSTDN.MAJR_DESC,
 :SGBSTDN.MAJR_ELIGIBILITY 
 from stvmajr
 where :SGBSTDN.SGBSTDN_MAJR_CODE_1 = stvmajr_code;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 :SGBSTDN.MAJR_DESC := null;
 :SGBSTDN.MAJR_ELIGIBILITY := NULL;
END;

Block.Name: RRRAREQ
Block.WhereClause:
where rrrareq_pidm = :KEY_BLOCK.PIDM 
 and rrrareq_treq_code = 'DEFREQ' 
 and rrrareq_aidy_code =
 (select rortprd_aidy_code
 from faismgr.rortprd
 where rortprd_term_code = :KEY_BLOCK.KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE
 and rortprd_aprd_code = 'FULL')

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN
 select rzrmemo_efc
 INTO :RZDFLOG.EFC
 from rzrmemo
 where rzrmemo_pidm = :KEY_BLOCK.PIDM
 and rzrmemo_aidy_code = :GLOBAL.AIDYEAR;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 message ('no EFC data found.');
 :RZDFLOG.EFC := null;
END;

BEGIN
 select rorenrl_finaid_adj_hr
 INTO :RZDFLOG.ADJ_HRS
 from rorenrl
 where rorenrl_pidm = :KEY_BLOCK.PIDM
 and rorenrl_term_code = :GLOBAL.CURR_TERM
 and rorenrl_enrr_code = 'REPEAT';
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 :RZDFLOG.ADJ_HRS := 0;
END;

BEGIN
 select rorenrl_finaid_credit_hr 
 INTO :RZDFLOG.CREDIT_HRS
 from rorenrl
 where rorenrl_pidm = :KEY_BLOCK.PIDM
 and rorenrl_term_code = :GLOBAL.CURR_TERM
 and rorenrl_enrr_code = 'STANDARD';
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 :RZDFLOG.CREDIT_HRS := 0;
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
EXECUTE_TRIGGER ('SHOW_CRSE_TITLE');
G$_CHECK_FAILURE;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
G$_KEY_OPT_MENU('KEY_BLOCK.KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE',
'Term Codes', 'LIST_VALUES',
'Term Summary (SHQTERM)','COUNT_QUERY',
'','','','');
G$_CHECK_FAILURE;
:CHECK_KEYS := 'N';

ProgramUnit.Name: S$_VALID_ID
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE S$_VALID_ID(ID IN OUT VARCHAR2,
 PIDM IN OUT NUMBER,
 FULL_NAME IN OUT VARCHAR2,
 CONFID_IND IN OUT VARCHAR2,
 DCSD_IND IN OUT VARCHAR2)
IS
 ENTITY_IND VARCHAR2(1);
BEGIN
 CONFID_IND := '';
 DCSD_IND := '';

 
DECLARE
 CURSOR ID_CURSOR IS
 SELECT SPRIDEN_PIDM,
 (SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME || ', ') || SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME || ' ' ||
 DECODE(SPRIDEN_MI,'','',SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_MI,1,1) || '. '),
 SPRIDEN_ENTITY_IND
 FROM SPRIDEN
 WHERE SPRIDEN_ID = ID
 AND SPRIDEN_CHANGE_IND IS NULL;
 BEGIN
 OPEN ID_CURSOR ;
 FETCH ID_CURSOR INTO PIDM, FULL_NAME, ENTITY_IND;
 IF ID_CURSOR%NOTFOUND THEN
 GOTO CHECK_FOR_PREVIOUS_ID ;
 ELSE
 GOTO CHECK_ENTITY;
 END IF ;
 END ;
--
<< CHECK_FOR_PREVIOUS_ID >>
 DECLARE
 CURSOR PREV_CURSOR IS
 SELECT SPRIDEN_PIDM,
 (SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME || ', ') || SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME || ' ' ||
 DECODE(SPRIDEN_MI,'','',SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_MI,1,1) || '. '),
 SPRIDEN_ID,
 SPRIDEN_ENTITY_IND
 FROM SPRIDEN
 WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM IN (
 SELECT SPRIDEN_PIDM
 FROM SPRIDEN
 WHERE SPRIDEN_ID = ID
 AND SPRIDEN_CHANGE_IND = 'I' )
 AND SPRIDEN_CHANGE_IND IS NULL;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PREV_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PREV_CURSOR INTO PIDM, FULL_NAME, ID, ENTITY_IND;
 IF PREV_CURSOR%NOTFOUND THEN
 MESSAGE('*ERROR* ID does not exist; press LIST for name/ID search.');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 ELSE
 MESSAGE('*WARNING* Previous ID replaced with current ID.' );
 END IF;
 END ;
--
<<CHECK_ENTITY>>
 IF ENTITY_IND = 'C' THEN
 MESSAGE('*ERROR* ID identifies a company; must enter a person ID.');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF;
--
<< CHECK_DECEASED >>
 DECLARE
 ALERT_BUT NUMBER;
 CURSOR DCSD_CURSOR IS
 SELECT '*DECEASED*'
 FROM SPBPERS
 WHERE SPBPERS_DEAD_IND = 'Y'
 AND SPBPERS_PIDM = PIDM ;
 BEGIN 
 OPEN DCSD_CURSOR ;
 FETCH DCSD_CURSOR INTO DCSD_IND;
 IF DCSD_CURSOR%FOUND AND
 ID <> :GLOBAL.KEY_IDNO THEN
 ALERT_BUT := G$_DISPLAY_ALERT(
 'S$_CAUTION_ALERT','Warning: This person is deceased.');
 END IF;
 END ;
--
<< CHECK_CONFID >>
 DECLARE
 ALERT_BUT NUMBER;
 CURSOR CONFID_CURSOR IS
 SELECT '*CONFIDENTIAL*'
 FROM SPBPERS
 WHERE SPBPERS_CONFID_IND IS NOT NULL
 AND SPBPERS_PIDM = PIDM ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN CONFID_CURSOR ;
 FETCH CONFID_CURSOR INTO CONFID_IND ;
 IF CONFID_CURSOR%FOUND AND
 ID <> :GLOBAL.KEY_IDNO THEN
 ALERT_BUT := G$_DISPLAY_ALERT('S$_CAUTION_ALERT',
 'Warning: Information about this person is confidential.'); 
 END IF;
 END ;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: AUDIT_TRAIL_2_1
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE AUDIT_TRAIL_2_1 IS
/*
AUDIT TRAIL: 2.1
1. Forms 4.0 conversion. AP 10/17/94
AUDIT TRAIL: 2.1.1
1. Mods for VGA BW 03-10-95
2. Character mode updates PL 04/28/95
AUDIT TRAIL: 2.1.5
1. Fixed defect #2827. Added global.key_ah_crn so that when SHATCKS, SHATCKC, OR SHATCKP is called, the correct section will be displayed. CE 05/16/95
2. Implement role-based security. TW 09/06/95
AUDIT TRAIL: 2.1.8
1. Expand course number to 5 characters.
 AK 11/07/95
2. Added code to WHEN-NEW-FORM-INSTANCE VB 01/24/96
 Trigger to make form automatically
 query the data when called from CAPP
 forms.
3. Forms 4.5 conversion. MS 06/10/06
AUDIT TRAIL: 2.1.20
1. Change login in trigger CHECK_WHICH_FORM
 to be able to call SHATCKC form. EK 05/01/97.
2. Removed references to :form_header.current_release 
 and added all text to this new procedure. TI 05/05/97
3. Added G$_check_failure to Pre-Form trigger. TI 05/05/97
AUDIT TRAIL END
*/
BEGIN
 NULL;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: AUDIT_TRAIL_3_0_B2K
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE AUDIT_TRAIL_3_0_B2K IS
/*
AUDIT TRAIL: 3.0 INIT DATE
1. Enhancements for Banner2000 upgrade. These include SQ 01/01/97
 adding an object group which contains the objects for
 the toolbar, adding an object group which highlights
 the active record within a block, a mouse-doubleclick
 and when-timer-expired trigger at the form level and
 this audit trail.
2. DEFECT#: 4217 BY: JWF 06/25/97
 FIX: When user clicks the "select" button, the cursor will now
 navigate to the record that the button resides on, prior
 to calling the appropriate form.
 TECHNICAL: Set "mouse navigable" attribute to true on select button.

3. Defect ... 7348 AT 08/06/97
 Problem .. Font of text for all buttons is incorrect.
 Fix ...... Default visual attribute replaced by G$_NVA_BUTTON_ITEM
 for all buttons.
AUDIT TRAIL: 3.1
1. Defect 7819. Corrected property for triggers key-duprec. MS 11/13/97
2. Release number changed to 3.1. AT 04/23/98
AUDIT TRAIL END
*/
BEGIN
 NULL;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: ALERTS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE ALERTS (mesg VARCHAR2) IS
 alert_button NUMBER;
BEGIN
 SET_ALERT_PROPERTY('SARAHS_ALERT', ALERT_MESSAGE_TEXT, mesg);
 alert_button := SHOW_ALERT('SARAHS_ALERT');
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: AUDIT_TRAIL_4_0_B2K
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE AUDIT_TRAIL_4_0_B2K IS
/*
AUDIT TRAIL: 4.0
1. GW 09/05/98
 Enhancements for Banner2000 4.0 upgrade. These include replacing the toolbar
 object group which contains the new horizontal and vertical toolbars, the 
 navigational frame. Also changes the coordinate system to REAL and resizes
 the windows and canvases. Changes to name visual attributes, many new property
 classes and reduced number of redundant triggers. See the General 4.0 TRM 
 for more details.
2. GW 09/05/98
 Expand the campus and part of term fields.
2. WG 04/16/99
 Changed the icon name for SELECT_IND_BTN from drilldown to details.
AUDIT TRAIL: 4.3
1. GMW 01/13/2000 Defect 32795
 Added a new field hold_term_code and code to the form level 
 key-exit trigger to loop through the shrtgpa records, recalcing 
 gpas for any the student has.
2. GMW 02/11/2000 Defect 35511
 Made the same change to the KEY-CLRFRM trigger as was made for 
 defect 32795.
AUDIT TRAIL: 4.3.3
1. GMW 05/19/2000 Defect 38854
 When clicking the Detail button in the SEL column, you go to the
 first course, regardless of positioning of cursor, clicking.
 * Changed the WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED trigger on field SELECT_IND_BTN
 in block SHRTCKN, to move the cursor to the same record that
 corresponded to the select button pressed.
AUDIT TRAIL END


*/
BEGIN
 NULL;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: ATVI_AUDIT_TRAIL
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE ATVI_AUDIT_TRAIL IS
BEGIN
 /* ************ TVI Audit Trail **************
1. 2-FEB-01 SPeterson
 Cloned baseline form to create RZADETL 
 Term code information must be updated each
 term in form level GLOBAL_COPY trigger.
2. 24-JUL-02 SPeterson
 Converted to Forms6i 
3. 06-JAN-03 SPeterson
 set up term control table (ryvtmct) and corresponding
 form (RZVTMCT) so FAO can maintain term and aid year
 data. This required changes to :GLOBAL.xxxxxx variables.
 New form level trigger (term_control) was added to
 retrieve data from ryvtmct table and populate the 
 :GLOBAL.xxxxx variables.
4. 17-APR-2012 LVarnedoe CNMCCWR#5106
 Have ADJ_HRS look at rorenrl_fa_adj_hr_rep_chk instead of rorenrl_finaid_adj_hr.
 This required making a change in the CHECK_ADJ_HRS trigger and in the POST-QUERY 
 trigger on the RZDFLOG data block.
5. 20-JUN-2013 LVarnedoe CNMCCWR#5423
 The RORENRL table was updated and now includes an enrollment rule. The rorenrl_fa_adj_hr_rep_chk 
 field was also made obsolete. Most students now have 2 rows in the table. One for STANDARD hours and 
 one for REPEAT hours. Because of this, the select statement for adj_hrs was returning too many rows
 causing the POST-QUERY on the RZDFLOG block to fail. The request asked that adjusted hours be calculated 
 on the rorenrl_finaid_adj_hr field again and that it be where the enrollment rule equaled REPEAT. It
 also asked that STANDARD hours be shown. These are calculated on the rorenrl_finaid_credit_hr field. This
 part of the request required a new text box and text item on the RZDFLOG block and additional code in it's
 POST-QUERY and a new trigger on the form called CHECK_CREDIT_HRS. 
 */
 NULL;
END;

Trigger.Name: CHECK_SAP
Trigger.TriggerText:
--check for current SAP
BEGIN
 select rorsapr_sapr_code
 INTO :GLOBAL.CURR_SAP
 from rorsapr
 where rorsapr_pidm = :KEY_BLOCK.PIDM
 and rorsapr_term_code = :GLOBAL.CURR_TERM;
-- and rorsapr_term_code = :KEY_BLOCK.KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE;
 IF :GLOBAL.CURR_SAP NOT IN ('Y','P','C','A') THEN
 :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE1 := ('1-Not Making Satisfactory Progress');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 ELSE
 :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE1 := NULL;
 END IF;
--if no current sap exists the look to the previous term
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 BEGIN
 select rorsapr_sapr_code
 INTO :GLOBAL.PREV_SAP
 from rorsapr
 where rorsapr_pidm = :KEY_BLOCK.PIDM
 and rorsapr_term_code = :GLOBAL.PREV_TERM;
 IF :GLOBAL.PREV_SAP NOT IN ('Y','P','C','A') THEN
 :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE1 := ('1-Not Making Satisfactory Progress');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 ELSE
 :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE1 := NULL;
 END IF;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE1 := ('1-No current or previous SAP found.');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END;
END;

Trigger.Name: CHECK_MAJOR
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN
 :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE2 := NULL;
 
 IF(:SGBSTDN.MAJR_ELIGIBILITY = 'N') THEN
 :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE2 := ('2-Enrolled in an INELIGIBLE MAJOR.');
 ELSIF (:SGBSTDN.MAJR_ELIGIBILITY = 'Y') THEN
 :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE2 := NULL;
 END IF;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
END;

Trigger.Name: CHECK_PCKG_COMP
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 v_pckg_req_comp date;

BEGIN
 select rorstat_pckg_comp_date
 INTO v_pckg_req_comp
 from rorstat
 where rorstat_pidm = :KEY_BLOCK.PIDM
 and rorstat_aidy_code = :GLOBAL.AIDYEAR;
 
 IF v_pckg_req_comp IS NULL THEN
 :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE3 := ('3-Packaging Req. Is Not Complete.');
 ELSE
 :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE3 := NULL;
 END IF;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE3 := ('3-Packaging Req. Is Not Complete.');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
END;

Trigger.Name: CHECK_ADJ_HRS
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 v_adj_hrs number(6,2);

BEGIN
 select rorenrl_finaid_adj_hr 
 INTO v_adj_hrs
 from rorenrl
 where rorenrl_pidm = :KEY_BLOCK.PIDM
 and rorenrl_term_code = :KEY_BLOCK.KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE
 and rorenrl_enrr_code = 'REPEAT';
 
 IF v_adj_hrs <= 0 THEN
 :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE4 := ('4-Adjusted Enrollment is 0 Hours.');
 ELSE
 :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE4 := NULL;
 END IF;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE4 := ('4-No Finaid adjusted hours exist.');
END;

Trigger.Name: CHECK_CREDIT_HRS
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 v_credit_hrs number(6,2);

BEGIN
 select rorenrl_finaid_credit_hr 
 INTO v_credit_hrs
 from rorenrl
 where rorenrl_pidm = :KEY_BLOCK.PIDM
 and rorenrl_term_code = :KEY_BLOCK.KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE
 and rorenrl_enrr_code = 'STANDARD';
 
 IF v_credit_hrs <= 0 THEN
 :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE5 := ('5-Credit Enrollment is 0 Hours.');
 ELSE
 :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE5 := NULL;
 END IF;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE5 := ('5-No Finaid adjusted hours exist.');
END;

Trigger.Name: CHECK_DEF_DROP_DATE
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 v_def_drop date;

BEGIN
 :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE6 := NULL;

 select rzdflog_def_drop_date
 INTO v_def_drop
 from rzdflog
 where rzdflog_pidm = :KEY_BLOCK.PIDM
 and rzdflog_term_code = :GLOBAL.CURR_TERM
 and rzdflog_activity_date = 
 (select max(rzdflog_activity_date)
 from rzdflog
 where rzdflog_pidm = :KEY_BLOCK.PIDM
 and rzdflog_term_code = :GLOBAL.CURR_TERM);
 IF v_def_drop IS NOT NULL THEN
 :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE6 := ('6-See deferment drop date.');
 ELSE
 :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE6 := NULL;
 END IF;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE6 := NULL;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
END;

Trigger.Name: CHECK_TRACKING_REQ
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 v_trst_code varchar2(1) ;

BEGIN
 :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE7 := NULL ;

 SELECT RRRAREQ_TRST_CODE
 INTO v_trst_code
 FROM RRRAREQ
 WHERE RRRAREQ_AIDY_CODE = :GLOBAL.AIDYEAR
 AND RRRAREQ_PIDM = :KEY_BLOCK.PIDM
 AND RRRAREQ_TREQ_CODE = 'DEFREQ' ;
 
 IF v_trst_code <> 'S' THEN
 :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE7 := ('7-Tracking Req. Is Not Satisfied.');
 ELSE
 :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE7 := NULL;
 END IF;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE7 := ('7-No Deferment request record found!') ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
END;

Trigger.Name: CHECK_DEGREE_GRAD
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 v_degree_by varchar2(1);
 v_prof_grad varchar2(1);

BEGIN
 :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE8 := NULL ;

 select nvl(rcrapp1_degree_by_july,0),
 nvl(rcrapp3_grad_or_prof,0)
 INTO v_degree_by,
 v_prof_grad
 from rcrapp1,
 rcrapp3
 where rcrapp1_aidy_code = :GLOBAL.AIDYEAR
 and rcrapp1_pidm = :KEY_BLOCK.PIDM
 and rcrapp1_infc_code = 'EDE'
 and rcrapp1_curr_rec_ind = 'Y'
 and rcrapp1_pidm = rcrapp3_pidm
 and rcrapp1_aidy_code = rcrapp3_aidy_code
 and rcrapp1_infc_code = rcrapp3_infc_code
 and rcrapp1_seq_no = rcrapp3_seq_no;
 
 IF ((v_degree_by <> '2') OR (v_prof_grad <> '2')) THEN
 :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE8 := ('8-Check degree by and prof/grad questions.');
 ELSE
 :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE8 := NULL;
 END IF;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE8 := ('8-No EDE record found!') ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
END;

Trigger.Name: CHECK_PELL_AMT
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 v_pell_term_amt number(12,2);
BEGIN
 :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE9 := NULL ;
 select rpratrm_offer_amt
 INTO v_pell_term_amt
 from rpratrm
 where rpratrm_aidy_code = :GLOBAL.AIDYEAR
 and rpratrm_pidm = :KEY_BLOCK.PIDM
 and rpratrm_term_code = :KEY_BLOCK.KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE
 and rpratrm_fund_code = 'PELL' ;
 IF v_pell_term_amt < 1 THEN
 :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE9 := ('9-No Pell award exists for term.');
 ELSIF v_pell_term_amt > 0 THEN
 :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE9 := NULL;
 END IF;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE9 := ('9-No Pell award exists for term.') ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
END;

Trigger.Name: CHECK_HOW_MANY
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 v_how_many number(1) := 0;

BEGIN
 IF :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE1 IS NOT NULL THEN
 v_how_many := v_how_many + 1;
 END IF;
 IF :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE2 IS NOT NULL THEN
 v_how_many := v_how_many + 1;
 END IF;
 IF :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE3 IS NOT NULL THEN
 v_how_many := v_how_many + 1;
 END IF;
 IF :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE4 IS NOT NULL THEN
 v_how_many := v_how_many + 1;
 END IF;
 IF :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE5 IS NOT NULL THEN
 v_how_many := v_how_many + 1;
 END IF;
 IF :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE6 IS NOT NULL THEN
 v_how_many := v_how_many + 1;
 END IF;
 IF :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE7 IS NOT NULL THEN
 v_how_many := v_how_many + 1;
 END IF;
 IF :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE8 IS NOT NULL THEN
 v_how_many := v_how_many + 1;
 END IF;
 IF :RZDFLOG.MESSAGE9 IS NOT NULL THEN
 v_how_many := v_how_many + 1;
 END IF;
 :RZDFLOG.HOW_MANY := v_how_many;
END;

DECLARE
 mesg varchar2(80);
BEGIN
 IF :RZDFLOG.HOW_MANY > 4 THEN
 mesg := ('Sheesh, this file is a mess!');
 ALERTS(mesg);
 END IF;

-- IF :DEPTNO > 50 THEN
-- mesg := ('INVALID NUMBER. PLEASE TRY AGAIN.');
-- ALERTS(mesg);
-- RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
-- END IF;
END;

Trigger.Name: INVALID_CODE_MSG
Trigger.TriggerText:
MESSAGE(
'*ERROR* Invalid code; press LIST for valid codes.' ) ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;

Trigger.Name: INVALID_FUNCTION_MSG
Trigger.TriggerText:
NULL ;
 MESSAGE( '*ERROR* Invalid function; press SHOW KEYS key' ||
 ' for valid functions.' ) ;

Trigger.Name: LIST_VALUES_COPY
Trigger.TriggerText: COPY( :GLOBAL.VALUE, :SYSTEM.CURRENT_FIELD ) ;

Trigger.Name: LOAD_CURRENT_RELEASE
Trigger.TriggerText: :CURRENT_RELEASE := '5.6.2';

Trigger.Name: UPDATE_ACTIVITY_DATE
Trigger.TriggerText:
:WORKDATE := :SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK ;
--
 :WORKDATE := SUBSTR(:WORKDATE, 1, 7) ;
--
 :WORKDATE := RPAD(:WORKDATE, 21, '_ACTIVITY_DATE') ;
--
 COPY( :CURRENT_DATE, :WORKDATE ) ;

Trigger.Name: GLOBAL_COPY
Trigger.TriggerText:
:KEY_BLOCK.ID := :GLOBAL.KEY_IDNO ;
--
 IF :ID IS NOT NULL THEN
 NEXT_FIELD ;
 PREVIOUS_FIELD ;
 END IF ;
--
 :KEY_BLOCK.KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE := :GLOBAL.KEY_TERM ;
--
 IF :KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN
 NEXT_FIELD ;
 PREVIOUS_FIELD ;
 END IF ;

-- rzadetl stuff
--:GLOBAL.AIDYEAR := '0203';
--
--:GLOBAL.FALLTERM := '200201';
--:GLOBAL.SPRTERM := '200202';
--:GLOBAL.SUMTERM := '200203';
--
-- Pick one of the following
--:GLOBAL.CURR_TERM := :GLOBAL.FALLTERM;
--:GLOBAL.CURR_TERM := :GLOBAL.SPRTERM;
--:GLOBAL.CURR_TERM := :GLOBAL.SUMTERM;
--
-- Pick one fo the following
--:GLOBAL.PREV_TERM := :GLOBAL.FALLTERM;
--:GLOBAL.PREV_TERM := :GLOBAL.SPRTERM;
--:GLOBAL.PREV_TERM := :GLOBAL.SUMTERM;

:GLOBAL.PELL_CODE := 'PELL' ;
:GLOBAL.TBRMEMO_TRAN_NUM := '1';
:GLOBAL.HOLD_TBRMEMO_AMOUNT := '0';
--end of rzadetl stuff

Trigger.Name: TERM_CONTROL
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 mesg1 varchar2(80) ;
BEGIN
 select ryvtmct_aidy_code,
 ryvtmct_curr_term_code,
 ryvtmct_prev_term_code
 INTO :GLOBAL.AIDYEAR,
 :GLOBAL.CURR_TERM,
 :GLOBAL.PREV_TERM
 FROM faismgr.ryvtmct
 WHERE ryvtmct_curr_term_code = :KEY_BLOCK.KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE ;
EXCEPTION 
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 select ryvtmct_curr_term_code,
 ryvtmct_curr_term_code,
 ryvtmct_prev_term_code 
 INTO :GLOBAL.AIDYEAR,
 :GLOBAL.CURR_TERM,
 :GLOBAL.PREV_TERM
 from ryvtmct ;
 MESSAGE ('*Caution* Data not configured for requested term code. 
 Contact a Fincial Aid Manager for assistance. 
 Results have been configured for '|| :GLOBAL.CURR_TERM||'.' ) ;
END ;

Trigger.Name: SAVE_KEYS
Trigger.TriggerText:
:GLOBAL.KEY_IDNO := :KEY_BLOCK.ID ;
--
 :GLOBAL.KEY_TERM := :KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE ;

Trigger.Name: ENABLE_KEYS
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ID',ENABLED) = 'FALSE' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ID',ENABLED,PROPERTY_ON);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ID',NAVIGABLE,PROPERTY_ON);
END IF;
IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE',ENABLED) = 'FALSE' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_ON);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE',NAVIGABLE,PROPERTY_ON);
END IF;
IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE_LBT',ENABLED) = 'FALSE' THEN
SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE_LBT',ENABLED,PROPERTY_ON);
SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE_LBT',NAVIGABLE,PROPERTY_ON);
END IF;
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ID_LBT',ENABLED,PROPERTY_ON);

Trigger.Name: KEY-EXIT
Trigger.TriggerText:
G$_GOQOLIB_KEY_TRIGGER.B2K_EXIT_FORM;

 :GLOBAL.VALUE := '' ;
--
 :GLOBAL.KEY_AH_SUBJECT := '' ;
--
 :GLOBAL.KEY_AH_COURSE := '' ;
--
 :GLOBAL.KEY_AH_CRN := '' ;
--
 G$_DETERMINE_ERASE_GLOBAL;
--
-- 2/10/99
/* 4.3 Defect 32795 Update the term gpa for all terms the
 student has. */
/* wr1700cnmcc this update appears to have been left over from original cloning of the form and not needed by this form
:hold_term_code := '000000';
 DECLARE
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT SHRTGPA_term_code
 FROM SHRTGPA
 WHERE SHRTGPA_PIDM = :PIDM
 AND SHRTGPA_TERM_CODE <> '000000' ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
<<loop>>
 :hold_term_code := '';
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO :hold_term_code ;
 if (PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND) THEN
 goto endhere;
 end if;
 IF (:hold_term_code <> '000000')then
 SHKCGPA.P_TERM_GPA(:PIDM, :hold_TERM_CODE, :GLOBAL.SAMSYS);
 goto loop;
 else goto loop;
 end if;
 CLOSE PTI_CURSOR;
 END;
<<endhere>>
:system.message_level := '15';
COMMIT;
G$_GOQOLIB_KEY_TRIGGER.B2K_EXIT_FORM;
*/

Trigger.Name: KEY-DUPREC
Trigger.TriggerText:
EXECUTE_TRIGGER ('INVALID_FUNCTION_MSG');
G$_CHECK_FAILURE;

Trigger.Name: KEY-CLRREC
Trigger.TriggerText:
EXECUTE_TRIGGER ('INVALID_FUNCTION_MSG');
G$_CHECK_FAILURE;

Trigger.Name: KEY-NXTKEY
Trigger.TriggerText:
EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'INVALID_FUNCTION_MSG' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;

Trigger.Name: KEY-DELREC
Trigger.TriggerText:
EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'INVALID_FUNCTION_MSG' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;

Trigger.Name: KEY-CREREC
Trigger.TriggerText:
EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'INVALID_FUNCTION_MSG' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;

Trigger.Name: KEY-COMMIT
Trigger.TriggerText:
EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'INVALID_FUNCTION_MSG' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;

Trigger.Name: KEY-CLRFRM
Trigger.TriggerText:
EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'SAVE_KEYS' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER ('ENABLE_KEYS');
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE;
 CLEAR_FORM ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'LOAD_FORM_HEADER' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'GLOBAL_COPY' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER('CLOSE_WINDOWS');
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE;

Trigger.Name: PRE-UPDATE
Trigger.TriggerText:
EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'UPDATE_ACTIVITY_DATE' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;

Trigger.Name: WHEN_WINDOW_ACTIVATED_TRG
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :SYSTEM.EVENT_WINDOW IS NULL OR
 :SYSTEM.EVENT_WINDOW NOT IN ('G$_OPT_WINDOW', 'SHRTCKN_WINDOW') THEN
 G$_SET_INST_PROPERTY;
END IF;
 G$_SET_WIN_PROPERTY;
IF :SYSTEM.EVENT_WINDOW IS NOT NULL AND
 :SYSTEM.EVENT_WINDOW <> 'G$_OPT_WINDOW' THEN
 IF :SYSTEM.EVENT_WINDOW = 'MAIN_WINDOW' THEN
 IF :SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK = 'KEY_BLOCK' THEN
 G$_DETERMINE_CURSOR_LOCATION ('KEY_BLOCK.ID');
 ELSE
 G$_DETERMINE_CURSOR_LOCATION ('SHRTCKN.SHRTCKN_TERM_CODE');
 END IF;
 ELSIF :SYSTEM.EVENT_WINDOW = 'SHRTCKN_WINDOW' THEN
 G$_DETERMINE_CURSOR_LOCATION ('SHRTCKN.SHRTCKN_CRSE_TITLE');
 END IF;
END IF;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-FORM-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
:GLOBAL.SECRSYS :='';
IF GET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(USER_INTERFACE) = 'CHARMODE' THEN
 SET_WINDOW_PROPERTY('SHRTCKN_WINDOW',POSITION, 252, 85);
ELSE
 SET_WINDOW_PROPERTY('SHRTCKN_WINDOW',POSITION, 246, 68);
END IF;
--
G$_SET_WIN_PROPERTY ;
EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'LOAD_FORM_HEADER' ) ;
G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'GLOBAL_COPY' ) ;

G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
G$_SET_INST_PROPERTY;
IF :GLOBAL.FORM_WAS_CALLED = 'Y' THEN
 NEXT_BLOCK;
 :GLOBAL.FORM_WAS_CALLED := '';
END IF;

Trigger.Name: WHEN_NEW_BLOCK_INSTANCE_TRG
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :CHECK_KEYS = 'Y' THEN
 :CHECK_KEYS := 'N';
 GO_BLOCK ('KEY_BLOCK');
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'CHECK_KEYS' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
--
 NEXT_BLOCK ;
 EXECUTE_QUERY ;
 :CHECK_KEYS := 'N';
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER ('DISABLE_KEYS');
END IF;
